entries.title: Highly immune evasive omicron XBB.1.5 variant is quickly becoming dominant in U.S. as it doubles weekly
entries.description: XBB.1.5 now represents about 41% of new cases nationwide in the U.S., according to CDC data.

entries.title: Cristiano Ronaldo signs with Saudi Arabian soccer club Al Nassr for reported record-breaking salary
entries.description: The news of Ronaldo's signing Friday follows months of rumors and speculation as to whether he would join a Saudi team offering a lucrative contract.

entries.title: Building emergency savings is a top financial resolution for 2023, survey finds. Here’s how to get started
entries.description: When it comes to financial resolutions for 2023, there's one goal at the top of many people's lists — building an emergency fund.

entries.title: Solana's slide accelerates — $50 billion in value wiped from the cryptocurrency in 2022
entries.description: DeFi crypto Solana has struggled in 2022, between outages and exposure to FTX, but will 2023 hold more of the same, or be a boon for the Ethereum competitor?

entries.title: Here's how to know if your company's layoff policy is a 'good' one
entries.description: As layoffs spread, here's what to know about severance, health insurance and other benefits that distinguish a fair job separation offer from an unfair one.

entries.title: Trump's tax returns released by House Ways and Means Committee
entries.description: The House Ways and Means Committee released former President Donald Trump's tax returns after a years long legal battle.

entries.title: FTX's Japanese users will be able to start withdrawing funds from February
entries.description: FTX Japan says it is developing a system to resume withdrawals through the website of Liquid Japan, a crypto exchange it acquired earlier this year.

entries.title: Bahamian regulator says it seized $3.5 billion of FTX crypto assets for 'safekeeping'
entries.description: The Securities Commission of The Bahamas said it moved $3.5 billion from FTX's Bahamian subsidiary, FTX Digital Markets, into its own digital wallets.

entries.title: The Fed won't be what drives markets in 2023, wealth manager says
entries.description: Fed officials and economists expect interest rates to stay high next year, with reductions unlikely until 2024.

entries.title: Precious metal platinum set for best quarter since 2008 on supply concerns
entries.description: The price of platinum is up over 20% since late September, and the metal is set to experience its best quarter since 2009.

entries.title: European stocks set to log worst year since 2018
entries.description: Economies around the world began the year still trying to emerge from the Covid-19 pandemic.

entries.title: The gourmet food scene in the UAE is taking on the likes of Paris, New York and London
entries.description: While the economic outlook for much of the world is predicted to be rocky over 2023, in the Gulf there's a buoyant mood.

entries.title: Weapons for Russia, anti-government protests and the nuclear deal: What lies ahead for Iran in 2023
entries.description: Against the backdrop of the war in Ukraine, Iran's ties to Russia are growing, and it's the closest it's ever been to reaching nuclear bomb-making capability.

entries.title: Risk of a dangerous new Covid variant in China is 'quite low,' U.S. health expert says
entries.description: It's unlikely that a dangerous new Covid-19 variant is spreading in China, said Dr. Chris Murray,  director of the Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation.

entries.title: Singapore's venture capital scene looks set for a 'pretty decent' 2023, investment firm says
entries.description: Global venture dollars may have dropped in 2022, but SGInnovate, Singapore's government-owned tech investment firm, is optimistic about 2023.
